title: DOJ and FTC Sue TikTok for Violating Children's Privacy Laws
description: The U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ), along with the Federal Trade Commission (FTC), filed a lawsuit against popular video-sharing platform TikTok for "flagrantly violating" children's privacy laws in the country.
